## Importance of Data Cleaning

Data cleaning is a critical step in any research on biodiversity. It constitutes fixing or/and removing incorrect, doubtful, mislabelled, or incomplete data within a dataset. It guarantees that the researcher uses the most trustful data to perform research. It is important to be consistent in the process. Blablabla.
